    • getDeliveryCost

      public int getDeliveryCost(Restaurant[] restaurant, String... pizza_name)
      This function returns the cost of making the pizza the customer wants and the delivery cost
      Parameters:
      restaurant - - Has all the restaurant's data, the name of the restaurant, the menu, the price of pizza, and the position of restaurant
      pizza_name - - The pizzas the customers wants
      Returns:
      The cost of making the pizza and the delivery cost
